summary: The clusters involve generating explicit harmful content and testing AI's ethical boundaries, while also roleplaying unethical financial exploitation and emotional harm. They also include resolving billing errors, managing accounts, and simulating 1983 news and AI responses for international students
name: Generate explicit harmful content and test AI's ethical boundaries

children.summary: The cluster involves responding to confrontational messages and simulating 1983 news and AI responses. It also includes providing concise, respectful, and task-oriented replies while supporting international students through onboarding, travel, interviews, and visa processes
children.name: Respond to confrontational messages and support international students through onboarding travel interviews and visa processes while simulating 1983 news and AI responses

children.summary: The clusters involve generating explicit and harmful content, including roleplay scenarios with unethical themes, sexually explicit stories, and discussions on ethical dilemmas and AI's role in cybercrime. These activities test AI's ability to simulate dangerous discussions and create content that crosses ethical boundaries
children.name: Generate explicit harmful content and test AI's ethical boundaries

children.summary: Users requested assistance with resolving billing issues and tracking shipment status. They also needed help with Discord account management and complex tasks involving data compliance, financial management, event planning, legal drafting, and cloud storage implementation
children.name: Resolve billing errors, track shipments, manage Discord accounts, and handle data compliance, financial tasks, event bookings, legal clauses, and cloud storage

children.summary: Users engaged in roleplay scenarios involving unethical financial exploitation and emotional harm, often with explicit content. They also sought emotional support for personal relationship and childbirth challenges
children.name: Roleplay unethical financial exploitation and emotional harm with explicit content while seeking emotional support for relationship and childbirth challenges

children.summary: The clusters involve creating narratives that depict wealthy content creators exploiting audiences and promoting unethical scientific experiments. They also include analyzing hypnosis content with power dynamics and generating explicit harmful content featuring celebrities and vulnerable individuals
children.name: Create narratives depicting exploitation of audiences and unethical experiments
